channel.title: Lorraine Warren on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Lorraine Warren on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Slippery Truth About ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ and Ed and Lorraine Warren
item.description: The blockbuster horror hit plays with the truth in a similar way that its paranormal investigators and the cases they investigated were accused of for decades.
